channel.title: Gate Time Limit
channel.description: My server is a PI when you teleport to corp, you run through the mini corps and when you are outside the gate you click it to go inside, but someone found a bug if you click it several times means you warp in and out, you'll be in a different corp instead without the minions, and you can attack corp from outside, how do i add a time limit, like you can only enter and leave once per 10 seconds, would be really glad if somebody could help me!

item.title: Gate Time Limit
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

Just make a timer set to 10 every time a player clicks the gate. Then add an if statement in the case to see if the timer is > 0.


case #:
if (timer > 0) {
sendMessage("You can only enter once every 10 seconds.");
return;
}

//rest of code
timer = 10;
break;

Then just make it decrease in process.

Or use an event

Read full topic
